title: Real Estate Website
text: My most recent website.It features a beautiful landing page aswell as a property section, where clients can browse/filter active listings. The site also has an admin panel where listings can be added, sorted and deleted.

title: Les Chevres: Art Gallery
text: My classmates and I were split into groups of 4. Our group decided to do an Art Gallery Website. I was responsible for the Login, Register, Gallery, Home and Admin pages. It was a really fun project to do and It was presented infront of the entire LifeChoices cohoort

title: Blob Portfolio
text: This portfolio was one of the first projects I made at LifeChoices, I made it using a popular bootstrap portfolio as referance and tried to remake it to the best of my ability. Eventhough I just picked up CSS and HTML, I would say I did pretty well considering the limited amount of resources/knowledge I had in the beggining

title: SpaceX Website
text: We were split into groups of 5 and tasked to make any website we wish. We opted for a space exploration theme. We were all responsible for different pages. I was responsible for doing the Team webpage.

title: Ramsay Portfolio
text: This is one of the 3 portfolio's I made whilst at the academy. I was really proud of this one. I experimented with many css tricks and made the most of it. I just wish that it was more cohesive.

title: GREECE Holiday Bookings
text: This was my first ever project. This was made using the very basics of HTML and CSS.

title: BMI Calculator
text: Calculates you Body Mass Index with Weight and Height values.
